name: haxe-heaps-mobile-game
description: A mobile-focused game project built with Haxe and Heaps.io, featuring TypeScript integration

scripts.build:tsc:prod: tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && esbuild dist/main.js --bundle --outfile=dist/bundle.js --format=esm --minify && terser dist/bundle.js --output dist/bundle.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.vite:build:prod: npm run build:tsc:prod && vite build --mode production
